dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "It appears that we have visitors."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Seriously, Sayori? You brought a boy to the club?"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Hey- I wasn’t expecting anyone new. We haven’t even put out fliers for the club yet!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "But look, Natsuki! We have another girl too!"

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *empty thoughts*

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Ehehe, if I knew we were expecting more members- I would've asked Natsuki to bake some welcome cupcakes!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Oh! And maybe I could've asked Yuri to make tea as well!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "I need to write this down for later: 'Plan Tea Party for Club Soon'"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "Sounds like you’re already very excited about our new guests. You haven’t even asked for their names yet-"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Ah, right! Eheh, silly me. What’re your names, new literature club attendees?"

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Beep skee!"

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *happy gesture*

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "You two are Boyfriend and Girlfriend? Aww, you look so cute together!!!"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "...that’s cute and all, but like, what are your names?"

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Beep skee!"

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *another happy gesture*

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Yes, we know that you guys are dating! We wanna know your NAMES!"

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Bee dee skee dep!"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "...I don’t like them already."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "They’re already messing with me!"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "Natsuki! Not so harsh..."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Hmph."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Eheheh... I’m sorry about that. If you don’t want to tell us your names, that’s ok!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "I’m Sayori!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "That lovely lavender lady over there is Yuri, and Natsuki is the one who’s real sassy today."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "With introductions aside... may we ask what these microphones are for?"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "I was just about to ask that."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "I hope you didn’t confuse this place with the music club-"

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Boop dee!"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "...you really want to sing with us?"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "I’m... not sure how comfortable I’d feel doing that-"

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Skee dep doop!"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "Wh-what do you mean I have to?!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "You know, we’ve been working so hard on writing and poems lately. I think having a fun singing session with everyone is the perfect break we all need!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "When you think about it, songs are just poems with music behind them, aren’t they?"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "I bet we’d all be great at this!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Here, I’ll go first!"
